MajorClaims.Text: once you are unique enough, you are already on the way to success
being different and unique is the better way to achieve success

Claims.Text: If you don't make yourself outstanding enough or you fail to distinguish yourself from others, you will be easily replaced and eliminated by someone who is better than you
being unique can create your own value which can never be taken by others
It not only shows your competence but also creates your own value, making you take the lead in your way towards success

Premises.Text: when I was in college, I was always chosen to be the presenter of group report
I was the only one in my group who could present the report thoroughly and fluently
being positively different from everyone else usually means that you've achieved something that is superior than others
As living in a competent world, we are like playing a survival game
Only who has the sharpest weapon can survive
Take the most popular and prestigious technology company- Apple- for example
The reason why it gains such a tremendous success is because it achieves some brilliant qualities that can never be caught up by other competitors
It has its operating systems that can run smoother than any other companies and its design always wins the popularity among consumers
It is the uniqueness of Apple design that creates its own value
once you are special and unique, pursuing success is a matter of actively creating the fashion rather than passively waiting for other people to recognize and appreciate you
